text: Wolfgang Thonke (December 28, 1938 – January 22, 2019), was a German journalist, graduated military scientist, major general, and was the last Deputy Commanding General (A3) of the National People's Army Air Force.„Aviator stories – from take oft to landing“, matters of fact and experiences – recorded by members of the NPA Air Force, Strausberg in 2013, original edition (page 80): , Strausberg, Berlin, 2013. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German aviators Category:German journalists Category:German generals
title: Wolfgang Thonke
